name: opti11
description: Sujet du projet final Application web ultra-légère

scripts.build:html: find src -name '*.html' -exec sh -c 'for f; do mkdir -p dist/$(dirname "$f" | cut -c5-); html-minifier-terser --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments "$f" -o dist/${f#src/}; done' sh {} +
scripts.build:css: find src -name '*.css' -exec sh -c 'for f; do mkdir -p dist/$(dirname "$f" | cut -c5-); cleancss -o dist/${f#src/%.css/.min.css} "$f"; done' sh {} +
scripts.build: npm run build:html && npm run build:css && npm run build:purgecss && npm run build:js && npm run build:images && npm run update:html:css && npm run update:html:js
